name: Circuit Loops
detailed_description:
Fulfil your dream to create electronic music. Circuit Loops is the best option for you! A powerful EDM sequencer that will let you create any genre of music you like using built-in samples and loops. Compose your track today and become a part of a huge music show tomorrow! Get inspired by the best DJs and become the uprising star of the EDM scene!

Create Your Track

  • 10 pre-recorded beats;
  • 10 applicable instruments.
  • Built-in effects and recorder

Circuit Loops - easy start for your music producing career

short_description: Circuit Loops is a powerful EDM sequencer that will let you create any genre of music you like using built-in samples and loops. Compose your track today and become a part of a huge musical show business tomorrow! Get inspired by the best DJs and become an uprising star of the EDM scene!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD 6750

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9
  • Processor: Intel single core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2010 GPU
